solution_line_template: If in six years Tom's brother will be {brother_future_age} years old, he is currently {brother_future_age}-{years_in_future} = <<{brother_future_age}-{years_in_future}={brother_current_age}>>{brother_current_age} years old.

Since Tom's brother is {brother_age_multiplier} times as old as Tom's dog, Tom's dog is {brother_current_age}/{brother_age_multiplier} = <<{brother_current_age}/{brother_age_multiplier}={dog_current_age}>>{dog_current_age} years old currently.
Tom's dog will be {dog_current_age}+{years_in_future} = <<{dog_current_age}+{years_in_future}={dog_future_age}>>{dog_future_age} years old in six years.
